key_talking_points: Edmonton's Cody Ceci called for high-sticking at 0:37 of the first period, sending Florida to the power play. The score is 5-4 for Florida.
The period began with a flurry of physical play and a near-miss goal, contributing to an active start.
for_commentary_agent.context: A penalty early in the period creates a power play opportunity. Discuss the penalty while highlighting the active start to the game.

high_intensity_events.summary: Cody Ceci (EDM) called for High-sticking on Carter Verhaeghe (FLA) at 0:37
Missed Shot by Oilers hits the crossbar at 0:11

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the implications of the early power play for Florida and Edmonton's response to falling behind. Get player names using the tool.
